resources.string: Rate us in the App Store

Uta de Veer and Lane Clements Mclean are the co-founders of One Scream. Uta and Lane met in 2007 when their children were still very young. Lane only nearly escaped a violent rape attempt in university and, just before meeting Uta, a mugging. One of their first conversations was a reiteration of the mugging and the feelings of helplessness and fear that both attempts left behind. In 2015, Uta suggested they create an app to help women in this situation. One Scream was born. It feels great to turn something dark from your own life into a force for good for others!

Allow Ad to create a calendar event?
Would you like to join One Scream?
You are not protected.\nDon\'t forget to turn one scream back on!
YOU ARE BEING PROTECTED BY ONE SCREAM
We will hear you when you need us most

We hope you\'ll never need One Scream. \n\nBut if you are in danger and can not phone for help, we will hear your scream and send an automated message to police, telling them who you are and where to find you.

One Scream has been scientifically developed to only respond to genuine panic screams. Just as your own ear hears real distress, our app can distinguish a true panic scream from other screams and sounds.

Download the app and keep it running in the background. 

If we hear your scream three times, we know you are in real danger and activates an alarm and calls the police on your behalf. 

After the police hear your a recording of your scream, they have an open line to your phone. 

We do not listen for or record spoken words, we only ever record panic screams.

Your phone is switched off. 

You are on a call. 

You are at a concert or riding a roller coaster(too many screams!). 

You are using other voice-activated apps.
One Scream can not hear you if your phone is powered off or when you are on the phone.
One Scream can hear you if your phone is in your ba or less than 5 meters away from you.
We will not record your spoken words, we care about your Privacy. We will record your panic scream, it makes us smarter.
If our app activates a call to Police on your behalf, the Police will hear the recorded scream and they will have an open line to hear you.
When we can not hear you
\nThe good news is One Scream can hear you from a distance, and you will still be protected if your phone is buried in your bag.
You can feel safer now. By signing up you agree to our terms and conditions.
Your address helps us keep you safe. GPS and WIFI work together to communicate to Police where you are.
Enter your email address and we\'ll get you back on track.
Are you sure you want to turn off One Scream?

The phone will vibrate You will hear a loud siren Lights will flash.
You have 12 seconds to cancel the alarm before the police are notified.
You need to agree to the Term and Conditions first.
Knowing your address helps us keep you safe. GPS and WIFI work together to communicate to Police where you are.
Knowing your most frequented address \nhelps us keep you safe.
